item.title: paste yanked text on command buffer
item.description: Sometimes you need to paste yanked text while performing command. For example subtituting yanked text with some words. yanked text are stored in the 0 and " register. in the command mode you can paste this with ctrl-R [registe] example in our cases this would be ctrl-R 0 so full command would be for example :%s/[press ctrl-R then 0]/replacement/gc
